scripts.transform: token-transformer data/tokens.json tokens/global.json global & token-transformer data/tokens.json tokens/default.json default & token-transformer data/tokens.json tokens/light/ligth.json ligth & token-transformer data/tokens.json tokens/dark/dark.json dark & token-transformer data/tokens.json tokens/green/green.json green
scripts.style: style-dictionary build -c ./config/dark.json & style-dictionary build -c ./config/light.json & style-dictionary build -c ./config/green.json
scripts.sass: sass scss/style.scss css/style.css & sass scss/themes/dark.scss css/dark.css & sass scss/themes/green.scss css/green.css
